message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you think?
Your offer was a bit unbalanced, Alice. Let's be fair, I'll take 60% and you take 40%.
Okay, Bob, I'll meet you halfway. I'll take 55% and you can have 45%.  This is a good compromise, and we can both get something out of it.
